verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>staying<s%> in the <S%H3411>remote<s%> <S%H3411>part<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6370>concubine<s%> for himself from <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and she <S%H1980>went<s%> away from him to her father's <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and was <S%H8033>there<s%> for a <S%H3117>period<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

Then her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3820>tenderly<s%> to her in order to <S%H7725>bring<s%> her <S%H7725>back,<s%> taking with him his <S%H5288>servant<s%> and a <S%H6776>pair<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%> So she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her father's <S%H1>house,<s%> and when the girl's father <S%H1004>saw<s%> him, he was <S%H7200>glad<s%> to <S%H8055>meet<s%> him.

And his father-in-law, the girl's father, <S%H1>detained<s%> him; and he <S%H2388>remained<s%> with him <S%H3427>three<s%> <S%H7969>days.<s%> So they <S%H3117>ate<s%> and <S%H398>drank<s%> and <S%H8354>lodged<s%> <S%H3885>there.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H7925>got<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and he <S%H6965>prepared<s%> to <S%H1980>go;<s%> and the girl's father <S%H1>said<s%> to his son-in-law, <S%H559>"Sustain<s%> <S%H5582>yourself<s%> with a <S%H3820>piece<s%> of <S%H6595>bread,<s%> and <S%H3899>afterward<s%> you may <S%H310>go.<s%>"

So <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%> and the girl's father <S%H1>said<s%> to the <S%H559>man,<s%> <S%H376>"Please<s%> be <S%H4994>willing<s%> to <S%H2974>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night,<s%> and let your <S%H3885>heart<s%> be <S%H3820>merry.<s%>"

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H1980>go,<s%> but his father-in-law <S%H6484>urged<s%> him so that he <S%H3885>spent<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7925>arose<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the girl's father <S%H1>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Please<s%> <S%H4994>sustain<s%> <S%H5582>yourself,<s%> and <S%H3824>wait<s%> <S%H4102>until<s%> <S%H5704>afternoon<s%> <S%H5186><s%>"; so <S%H3117>both<s%> of them <S%H8147>ate.<s%>

When the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> along with his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> and <S%H5288>servant,<s%> his father-in-law, the girl's father, <S%H1>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Behold<s%> <S%H2009>now,<s%> the <S%H4994>day<s%> has <S%H3117>drawn<s%> to a <S%H7503>close;<s%> <S%H6150>please<s%> <S%H4994>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night.<s%> <S%H3885>Lo,<s%> the <S%H2009>day<s%> is <S%H3117>coming<s%> to an <S%H2583>end;<s%> <S%H2583>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H3885>here<s%> that your <S%H6311>heart<s%> may be <S%H3824>merry.<s%> Then <S%H3190>tomorrow<s%> you may <S%H4279>arise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> for your <S%H7925>journey<s%> so that you may <S%H1870>go<s%> <S%H1980>home.<s%>"

But the <S%H376>man<s%> was not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night,<s%> so he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>departed<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to [a place] <S%H5227>opposite<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> (that is, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>). And there were with him a <S%H6776>pair<s%> of <S%H2280>saddled<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys;<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> also was with him.

When they [were] <S%H5973>near<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>almost<s%> <S%H7286>gone;<s%> and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> and <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in it."

However, his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We will not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5237>foreigners<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are not of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but we will <S%H5674>go<s%> on as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places;<s%> and we will <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>"

So they <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>along<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> their way, and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>set<s%> on them <S%H681>near<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in order to <S%H935>enter<s%> [and] <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%> When they <S%H935>entered,<s%> they <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>square<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> for <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H622>took<s%> them into [his] <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night.<s%>

Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> from his <S%H4639>work<s%> at <S%H6153>evening.<s%> Now the <S%H376>man<s%> was from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and he was <S%H1481>staying<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> but the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H376>traveler<s%> <S%H732><s%> in the <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>square<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H575>"Where<s%> are you <S%H1980>going,<s%> and <S%H370>where<s%> do you <S%H935>come<s%> from?"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We are <S%H5674>passing<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H3411>remote<s%> <S%H3411>part<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> [for] I am from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and I <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> But I am [now] <S%H1980>going<s%> to my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H622>take<s%> me into his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"Yet <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>fodder<s%> for our <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> for me, your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> who is with your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>lack<s%> of <S%H3605>anything.<s%> <S%H1697><s%>"

And the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peace<s%> to you. <S%H7534>Only<s%> let me [take care of] <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4270>needs;<s%> <S%H7534>however,<s%> do not <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>square.<s%>"

So he <S%H935>took<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H9054>gave<s%> the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H9054>fodder,<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

While they were <S%H3190>making<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3190>merry,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H1121>fellows,<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1849>pounding<s%> the <S%H1817>door;<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318>"Bring<s%> out the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into your <S%H1004>house<s%> that we may <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H3045>relations<s%> with him."

Then the <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to them and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H408>"No,<s%> my <S%H251>fellows,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> do not <S%H7489>act<s%> so <S%H7489>wickedly;<s%> <S%H310>since<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1004>house,<s%> do not <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5039>act<s%> of <S%H5039>folly.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Here<s%> is my <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubine.<s%> <S%H4994>Please<s%> let me <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out that you may <S%H6031>ravish<s%> them and <S%H6213>do<s%> to them whatever you <S%H2896>wish.<s%> <S%H5869><s%> But do not <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> an <S%H1697>act<s%> of <S%H5039>folly<s%> against <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>"

But the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to him, so the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>seized<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> [her] out to them. And they <S%H3045>raped<s%> her and <S%H9412>abused<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then <S%H7971>let<s%> her <S%H7971>go<s%> at the <S%H5927>approach<s%> of <S%H7837>dawn.<s%>

As the <S%H1242>day<s%> began to <S%H6437>dawn,<s%> <S%H1242><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the man's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> her <S%H113>master<s%> was, <S%H5704>until<s%> [full] <S%H216>daylight.<s%>

When her <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H1980>go<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was <S%H5307>lying<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H5592>threshold.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H6965>"Get<s%> up and let us <S%H1980>go,<s%>" but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6030>answer.<s%> Then he <S%H3947>placed<s%> her on the <S%H2543>donkey;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H4725>home.<s%>

When he <S%H935>entered<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3979>knife<s%> and <S%H2388>laid<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> and <S%H5408>cut<s%> her in <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> limb by <S%H6106>limb,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it] <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"Nothing<s%> like <S%H2088>this<s%> has [ever] <S%H1961>happened<s%> or been <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H7760>Consider<s%> it, <S%H5779>take<s%> <S%H5779>counsel<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> up!"
